name.title: Full name
name.validationMessage: Real names promote trust within the comunity
name.feedback: What does your mum call you?

propertyType.title: I'm advertising a(n)
propertyType.note:
Apartment in a house refers to a self-contained rental unit within a detatched house. 
Low-rise refers to a building less than 5 storys tall. 
High-rise refers to a building 5 storeys or greater. 
Townhouse refers to individual houses placed side by side, where one or two walls are shared between neighbouring homes. 
House refers to a single detatched house. 
Loft refers to an open space converted to residential use; the bedroom is raised from the living area.
